ItemTooltips.ward_observer: Start with either Sentry or Observer. Generally Sentry is preferred since it will allow Bane the options to pull neutrals.
ItemTooltips.ward_sentry: Start with either Sentry or Observer. Generally Sentry is preferred since it will allow Bane the options to pull neutrals.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Getting all three of these mana items might be a bit overkill, generally two out of three is enough. Take your pick of the two, it mostly comes down to how much gold Bane has and player preference
ItemTooltips.soul_ring: Getting all three of these mana items might be a bit overkill, generally two out of three is enough. Take your pick of the two, it mostly comes down to how much gold Bane has and player preference
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Getting all three of these mana items might be a bit overkill, generally two out of three is enough. Take your pick of the two, it mostly comes down to how much gold Bane has and player preference
ItemTooltips.smoke_of_deceit: Smokes are very vital in allowing Bane to get close enough to use Fiend's Grip or Nightmare, both of which has relatively short cast range

AbilityTooltips.bane_enfeeble: This is the standard Support Bane build. For further exploitation to the build, as well as solo mid Bane build, check out my Youtube Guide of Bane.
